Dplyr verbs

Implementations of dplyr verbs that can be used to generate Substrait plans

select(<SubstraitCompiler>) rename(<SubstraitCompiler>) rename_with(<SubstraitCompiler>) filter(<SubstraitCompiler>) mutate(<SubstraitCompiler>) transmute(<SubstraitCompiler>) arrange(<SubstraitCompiler>) group_by(<SubstraitCompiler>) ungroup(<SubstraitCompiler>) summarise(<SubstraitCompiler>) summarize(<SubstraitCompiler>) collect(<SubstraitCompiler>) relocate(<SubstraitCompiler>) semi_join(<SubstraitCompiler>) anti_join(<SubstraitCompiler>) inner_join(<SubstraitCompiler>) left_join(<SubstraitCompiler>) right_join(<SubstraitCompiler>) full_join(<SubstraitCompiler>) distinct(<SubstraitCompiler>) count(<SubstraitCompiler>)
